body: You can have many duplicated in `all_outputs_vec`, which makes it inefficient. You should add only if `all_outputs` didn't have this element. Even more efficient would be to not have a vector in the first place, just iterate `all_outputs` and carefully use `std::unordered_set::erase`
body_html: You can have many duplicated in all_outputs_vec, which makes it inefficient. You should add only if all_outputs didn't have this element. Even more efficient would be to not have a vector in the first place, just iterate all_outputs and carefully use std::unordered_set::erase
